Organics/ Hellplague/ Necross/ Malice/ Sweeps:

As the shearing sheet of metal exploded from the ground, Hellplague 
roared.  Not in pain, but rage.  Her arms were not severed, but just 
as useless.  They hung limply at her sides, as she fell back, two 
Sweeps came and picked up their master.  Another came and picked up 
the critically damaged Organics.  The Sweeps carried them into the 
air and hung, as a Sweep attempted to repair Hellplague's arms.

Organics nearly passed out as Proto launched his ambush.  Though he 
succeeded in disabling Hellplague, an edge of th metal sheet dug deep 
into Organics' back, disabling her wings and limited the use of her 
legs.  The Sweep who retrieved her roughly grabbed her about he waist 
and jerked her with it.  

Necross rushed up and and opened fire with his acid blaster and 
missile blaster.

Malice let a low gowl slip fom his throat.  
"If only I had Sunstorm or other Seekers..!  This has gone on far too 
long!"
Malice turned his hateful glare to those who did not move.
"Stay back cowards!  Interfer, and I send you to the Allspark!"
He then marched forward, Chaos Breaker ready, and charged the 
minions, Proto, and the Sweeps, not caring who was in his way.  All 
that mattered was the safe return of his sister Organics.
